description: Try our easy to follow Fruit Mince Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fruit mince pie & tart,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Fruit Mince Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process flour and icing sugar in a food processor until combined. Add butter and process until the mixture resembles breadcrumbs. Add egg yolks and process until mixture comes together in a ball, adding a little water if necessary. Remove dough and knead lightly on floured board. Cover in plastic wrap and chill for 30 minutes.
Roll out pastry on lightly floured surface until 3mm thick. Using a 7cm fluted pastry cutter, cut out rounds. Line patty pans with pastry rounds. Fill each with 1 tablespoon of fruit mince.
Cut star shapes from remaining pastry and place on top of tarts. Bake for 15 minutes until golden. Cool and dust with icing sugar.
